name: Ultimate Lolita Storm
description:
Solve a mystery and prevent pesky ita lolitas from taking over Akihabara in a fast paced beat 'em up. This game was developed as a demo project at Kajaani University of Applied Sciences.

Check out our final gameplay trailer. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ufgAUZ7vcjw

And why not also watch our previous trailers, to see the progress we made during the development. https://www.youtube.com/user/genuinetobias/videos?view_as=subscriber

_____

DevTeam:

Jani Järvinen - Producer, Music & Audio

Jani Ollikainen - Lead Programmer

Noora Soini - Character Artist, Programmer

Antti Hartikainen - Enviroment Artist

Credits for public domain assets:
